task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 15°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full facade including roofline, so I should tilt the camera upward while keeping the building centered.
With the camera pitched up I can judge the building’s floors and roofline, so I should stop and provide a height estimate based on an apparent ~3-story structure.
